EmailTemplate.name: 201808_ROUpdatesR2_LG.201808_ROUpdatesR2_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: New Ways to Streamline Your Repair and Overhaul Orders
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Managing Your Repair & Overhaul Orders Keeps Getting Easier We are always looking for ways to ensure your repair and overhaul orders are processed quickly and accurately. Our goal is to keep you flying. Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]> to experience the benefits.
Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]> Online Ordering
- Eliminate unnecessary delays waiting for quote approval by agreeing to bypass the quote approval process for orders covered by contractual pricing terms. - Reduce order entry delays and errors with access to consistent published pricing across all sites. - Enter a removal date in the future to plan ahead and reduce your effort. Order Status
- Release your order for processing quickly from quote approval with a single click. - View and download scrap certifications within MyAerospace without having to manually request them. - Track carrier shipping status for two new carriers: Sterling Global Aviation Logistics and Mach 1 Global. Let us Know!
Keep track of our updates on MyAerospace. <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/R00q00rI0G002000Q9X2eZ0]]> Please also continue to provide feedback on your service experiences and what's most important to you.
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> If you have questions, please contact your Honeywell business representative.
Visit MyAerospace <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com]]>.
